creator.description:
Maintaining safety for Tripazeada members and their CC's.

https://discord.gg/tripazeada

Non-official Bluesky account.
From fans, to fans.

locales.description: Accounts that may contain hateful content or hate speech against the Tripazeada community.
locales.name: Suspicious account

locales.description: Users who are toxic towards Tripazeada members, content creators or who may hurt others mentally or physically.
locales.name: Toxicity

locales.description: Users who have hateful behavior against content creators, Tripzada members, cellbit fans or roier fans.
locales.name: Hating communities
